name: The Substance of Things
description:
A relaxing experience that asks you to be patient with it.
A moment of respite in your pocket.

The Substance of Things is an experimental art game. It is part living wallpaper gallery, musical white noise library and test of endurance. It is an encouragement to hold faith through trying, often ambiguous situations.

Pay close attention and it will reveal itself to you. Patience and diligence will give way to results.

“Now Faith is being sure of what we hope for; believing that which we cannot see. "


Features:
- No Controls
- Hand Crafted Painterly Aesthetic
- Living Wallpapers
- Dynamic Musical White Noise
- Use as a Soundscape for Focus, Relaxation, Meditation and Yoga.
- Clues & Secrets
- Poetry


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

"The Substance of Things does not at any point demand your attention, though you cannot help but offer it up." -- Hyperjelly

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
